attributes.action: So make Friday a day off for schools across the UK
attributes.additional_details: Just come to a conclusion about how we can make it happen
attributes.background: To make Friday a day a day off however teachers should get the same pay and we can do an extra lesson Monday to Thursday

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Require schools to make Friday a part of the school weekend
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597715
